name: TONE
description:
Description

Tone is a platformer game about a young female who is able to see different dimensions in the form of colors, use these powers to your advantage by maneuvering through different planes to get to the finish.

Something's wrong with our world. Different strands of dimensions are crossing between each other and is destroying our universe as we speak but, You are not like the others, reality weaves through you in the form of colors allowing you to shift at will by aligning yourself with the dimension's color. Now go, our universe depends on it.

Controls

  • [Arrow Keys] = Movement
  • [W] = Yellow Shift; [A] = Blue Shift; [S] = Green Shift; [D] = Red Shift
  • [R] - Restart Level

Credits

  • Elbert Hans Lianto (Team Manager & Game Designer)
  • Ryu Faryan (Game Designer)
  • Williams Sanjaya (Game Designer)
  • Ferry (2D Artist)
  • Hubertus Darrel Santoso (2D Artist & Game Designer)
  • Steven Yoshell Yapriadi (2D Artist, Game Designer & Programmer)
  • Chalifa Sophie Anggit Andamari (Project Supervisor)
